attributes.action: PAY REPARATIONS/FINANCIAL COMPENSATION OF £38 MILLION POUNDS FOR DIRECT AND INSTITUTIONAL RACISM, 1 MILLION POUND FOR EVERY YEAR OF MY LIFE AS A VICTIM TO THIS GOVERNMENT, AND FOR ALL THOSE OTHER'S OF BLACK  AFRICAN NEGRO DIRECT DECENT AND ORIGINS WHO HAVE SUFFERED, BEEN STABBED, SHOT, RAPED AND MURDERED ALSO AS A RESULT OF DIRECT AND INSTITIONAL RACISM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
